com.topcoder.dependency
Class DependencyGraph

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.topcoder.dependency.DependencyGraph
public class DependencyGraph
extends java.lang.Object

This class keeps track of Dependencys and notifies Dependents when their Dependencys have changed.

This class is Thread safe.

See Also:
Dependency, Dependent

public DependencyGraph()
Constructs a new DependencyGraph.

DependencyGraph

public DependencyGraph(DependencyGraph graph)

Method Detail

addRelation

public boolean addRelation(Dependency dependent,
                           Dependency dependency)
Adds a relationship between two dependencies, one depending on the other.

This method does not touch anything.

Parameters:
dependent - The Dependency dependent on another Dependency
dependency - The Dependency on which another Dependency is dependent
Returns:
true if the relationship was added, false if the relationship already existed.

removeRelation

public boolean removeRelation(Dependency dependent,
                              Dependency dependency)
Removes a relationship between two dependencies, one depending on the other.

This method does not touch anything.

Parameters:
dependent - The Dependency that should no longer be dependent on the other Dependency
dependency - The Dependency on which the other Dependency should no longer be dependent
Returns:
true if the relationship was removed, false if the relationship did not exist.

touch

public void touch(Dependency dependency)
Lets this DependencyGraph know that the given Dependency has changed.

The DependencyGraph will notify all Dependent directly or indirectly dependent on the given Dependency via the method Dependent.touch().

Parameters:
dependency - The Dependency that has changed.

addDependency

public void addDependency(Dependency dependency)
Adds the given Dependency to the DependencyGraph.

Replaces all old relationships between this Dependency and its Dependencys if they exist with the Dependencys specified by Dependency.getDependencies().

After the dependency has been added, it will be touched which means any of its pre-existing Dependents will be touched exactly once.

Parameters:
dependency - The Dependency to be added.

removeDependency

public void removeDependency(Dependency dependency)
Removes the given Dependency to the DependencyGraph.

Removes all old relationships between this Dependency and its Dependencys if they exist.

After the dependency has been removed, it will not be touched which means none of its Dependents will be touched either.

Parameters:
dependency - The Dependency to be removed.
